application.name: VEEAM Backup & Recovery - Backup Job(s) By VMs
VEEAM Backup & Recovery - BackupSync Job(s) By VMs
VEEAM Backup & Recovery - EndPoint Backup job(s)

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[ResultBackup,{#JOBID}].avg(300)}>0 and {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[ResultBackup,{#JOBID}].avg(300)}<2
trigger_prototype.name: Backup {#JOBNAME} Warning

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[RunStatus,{#JOBID}].avg(28800)}=1 and {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[Type,{#JOBID}].regexp(BackupSync)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: The VEEAM work {#JOBNAME} is still running (8h)

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[ResultBackupSync,{#JOBBSID}].avg(300)}>0 and {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[ResultBackupSync,{#JOBBSID}].avg(300)}<2
trigger_prototype.name: Backup {#JOBBSNAME} Warning

application.name: VEEAM Backup & Recovery - BackupSync Job(s) By VMs
VEEAM Backup & Recovery - Backup Job(s) By VMs
VEEAM Backup & Recovery - EndPoint Backup job(s)
VEEAM Backup & Recovery - EndPoint Backup job(s)
VEEAM Backup & Recovery - EndPoint Backup job(s)

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[ResultEndpoint,{#JOBENDPOINTID}].avg(300)}>0 and {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[ResultEndpoint,{#JOBENDPOINTID}].avg(300)}<2
trigger_prototype.name: Backup {#JOBENDPOINTNAME} Warning
The VEEAM work {#JOBENDPOINTNAME} is still running (8h)

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[ResultReplica,{#JOBREPLICAID}].avg(300)}>0 and {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[ResultReplica,{#JOBREPLICAID}].avg(300)}<2
trigger_prototype.name: Backup {#JOBREPLICANAME} Warning
Less than 2Gb remaining on the repository {#REPONAME}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[ResultTape,{#JOBTAPEID}].avg(300)}>0 and {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:vbr[ResultTape,{#JOBTAPEID}].avg(300)}<2
trigger_prototype.name: Backup {#JOBTAPENAME} Warning
The VEEAM work {#JOBTAPENAME} is still running (8h)

trigger.expression: {Template VEEAM - Backup and Replication:system.run[powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File "C:\Program Files\Zabbix Agent\scripts\zabbix_vbr_job.ps1" exportxml,nowait].last()}<1
trigger.name: Export XML Veeam Error

mapping.newvalue: Disabled, First Backup or no history
